Contributor.description: A human, a human-like entity, or an organisation that contributed to the resource.

affiliations.description: organisation(s) that the contributor is associated with

contributor_id.description: Unique identifier (such as an ORCID or ROR ID) for a person or organisation

contributor_roles.description: List of one or more terms indicating the type of contribution. Should be a term from either CRedIT or DataCite's role vocabulary.

contributor_type.description: the type of the contributor, person or organisation

name.description: Full name of the contributor. It is suggested that organisations use this field.

Contributor.title: Contributor

ContributorRole.description: The type of contribution made by a contributor
ContributorRole.title: ContributorRole

ContributorType.description: The type of contributor being represented
ContributorType.title: ContributorType

DateFormat.description: The format used for the date
DateFormat.title: DateFormat

EventDate.description: The date of a specified event.

date.description: the date upon which the event occurred

event.description: the nature of the resource-related event that occurred on that date

EventDate.title: EventDate

EventType.description: The type of date being represented
EventType.title: EventType

FundingReference.description: funding information about a single funding source

award_id.description: code assigned by the funder to the grant or award

award_title.description: human-readable title of the grant or award

funder_id.description: ID for the funding entity - acceptable formats include Crossref funder ID, DOI, ROR, ISNI, others?

FundingReference.title: FundingReference

Organisation.description: an organization such as a company, university, or consortium

organisation_id.description: unique identifier for the organisation -- ROR / ISNI, etc.

Organisation.title: Organisation

description.description: brief description of what the ID links to

id.description: a resolvable URI or CURIE (compact URI) for a resource

relationship_type.description: how the resource represented by this ID relates to the original resource, as described by DataCite relation types

Resource.description: A data source of some type.

contributors.description: people and/or organisations responsible for generating the resource

identifier.description: resolvable persistent unique ID for the resource

license.description: license under which the data is made available

related_identifiers.description: other resolvable persistent unique IDs used to access the resource or related resources

resource_type.description: the type of resource being described

titles.description: formal title(s) of the data set

Resource.title: Resource

ResourceMetadata.description: metadata for the resource being represented

citation_metadata_schema_version.description: the version of the citation metadata schema used

timestamp.description: unix timestamp for the addition of this set of metadata

user.description: the ID of the workspace user who submitted the metadata

ResourceMetadata.title: ResourceMetadata

ResourceType.description: The type of resource being represented
ResourceType.title: ResourceType

title.description: a string used as a title for a resource

title_language.description: language in which the title element is written; a two- or three-letter code as described in RFC5646, https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc5646

title_type.description: a descriptor for the title. The default value is 'title'.

TitleType.description: The type of title being represented
TitleType.title: TitleType
